edge: The music composition of the movie was awarded Best Music Director at the 26th Filmfare Awards.
The cinematographer of the movie was nominated for Best Cinematography at the 26th Filmfare Awards.
The director of the movie was nominated for Best Director at the 26th Filmfare Awards.
Zeenat Aman won the Best Actress award at the 26th Filmfare Awards for her performance in this movie.
The lyricist of the song 'Satyam Shivam Sundaram' from this movie, Pandit Narendra Sharma, won the Best Lyricist award at the 26th Filmfare Awards.
The singer Mukesh won the Best Male Playback Singer award (posthumously) at the 26th Filmfare Awards for his rendition of 'Chanchal Sheetal' from this movie.
